Issue.creator: mathiasb303
Issue.summary: Token transfers with outputs containing no owner and/or a quantity of zero are not rejected
Issue.description: Creation of outputs with a quantity of zero, and outputs with no owner, is currently possible. This leads to scenarios where a well-intentioned user may end up losing his or her tokens (by creating a token transfer with no owner), or where a malicious user can flood the system with lots of tokens with no value.
